data.text: GALA goo wo nui Aɓakuke ná-GALA falii, é ga maawɔin wuyei.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gè naa mɛnini, nii è kɛɛni,
Ɗɔfɔ zeeɓɛi ɠa kakala ʋelei, é ɗa li,
Siɛgi zu a lona da, zooi ɠa ɲiikpi,
Gè Kusan nuiti ta-zeɠe ɠotaiti kaa, ti ɠaaʋalagai ba,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è yiiɠaawanaʋɛ ziɛ wolaiti ma ɓaa?
Gizeiti ta è ɠaana, ta ɗa ɓali,
Foloi ta alugi ti yɛ loni losuʋɛ,
Ɗa ʋaazu ɗa-nuɓusɛiti ta-ɓɔba vai ma,
Ɗa gi zili nuiti ta-ɠundiɠiiti tɔungiti kpotasu ga ti ɓɔɠɔ mɛɛinti.
È pelei laa ɗa-zooiti bɛ kpoloɗɛi wu,
Kooleɠoole gului la mɔ waa pɛ,
Kɛlɛ nɔ̀un nà, nà ɠoozunɛɛzu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maaʋele ma,
Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é ga nà-zobogi,
